article.title: Long-lived mesoscopic entanglement between two damped infinite harmonic chains

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the general form of the master equation describing the open dynamics of a microscopic observable X in the Kossakowski-Lindblad form?
choices: d/dt X(t) = L(N)[X(t)] = i[H(N), X(t)] + D(N)[X(t)]
d/dt X(t) = L(N)[X(t)] = i[X(t), H(N)] + D(N)[X(t)]

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the 4x4 Kossakowski matrix C encode in the dissipative part of the generator L(N)?
choices: The energy levels of the system

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the scaling factor of fluctuation operators in many-body systems?
What kind of state is a state ρ for the system called if the expectation of Weyl operators are in Gaussian form?
What is the necessary and sufficient condition for a two-mode Gaussian state to be separable, using the quantities I1, I2, I3, and I4 defined in equation (63)?
